abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Atlantic Seafood Restaurant and Fish Market, welcoming place to eat or buy seafood in Center Moriches, LI.
lead_paragraph: On the roadside in Center Moriches, entered through a yawning shark’s mouth, Atlantic Seafood Restaurant and Fish Market offers a bounty of good will.

headline.main: A Toothy Welcome to a Family Fish Restaurant on Long Island
headline.print_headline: In the Belly of the Beast
